column4: Hello.  I'm having some issues with the internet connection.  I installed 6.10 on my parents computer that has only a pci wireless card.  I was able to download all the updates, but when trying to 'surf the web' pages sometimes load, and sometimes will not.  Any ideas?
maybe the wireless signal strength is poor
or less likely, your DNS server is having problems, or less likely yet your network drivers have a bug
I thought the same thing, but then I wondered why it would download the updates without issue.
